short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office chairs to 60 Moodie Drive, Bldg. 3-3rd floor, K2H 8G1 DND (Carling) by 15 March 2023.
description: The full text of the notice of proposed procurement can be found here: https://canadabuys.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/e0ab5947f9f6b127a245b86caf2a1644/rfp_w23046_final.pdf
full_summary:
Supply Arrangement Information for Rotary Chairs
=====================================================================================================

### Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01022231
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Solicitation Number:** W7809A123046
*   **Publication Date:** January 23, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, 13:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** February 1, 2023

### Contract Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence

### Tender Details

*   **Product Category:** Office Seating – Rotary Chairs
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Requirements

*   The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating, specifically rotary chairs, to Building 3, 3rd Floor, Carling, by March 15, 2023.
*   Suppliers will need to provide dock/lift and mover services to transport the chairs from the Service Centre to Building 3, 3rd Floor.

### Eligibility Criteria

*   Only suppliers who have been pre-qualified and have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid.
*   Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders can submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority for evaluation.

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Viktoria Melnichuk
*   **Email:** [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 343-542-1604

Please contact the above-mentioned individual for any inquiries regarding this requirement. If you are interested in becoming a pre-qualified SA holder, please reach out to RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
